::Hot Rod::

"Shh. Dont say that. We will."

He noticed something about himself. Alone with her now, he was acting
more like his Autobot/Maximal self, personality wise. She brought out
his kinder side. 

He took her hand.
"Lets go to the Mess Hall. We can get something to eat, and a drink."
